full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,'JIG RTEN KHAMS SU BDE LEGS 'BYUNG BA DANG KLU RNAMS KYI BSOD NAMS KYI ZHING DU LEGS PAR BSGRUB PA'I DKYIL 'KHOR GYI RDUL TSON CHU BOR SPYAN 'DREN PA'I CHO GA BYA BA'I TSUL NI,

colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006B (RDUL TSON KLUL BTANG CHO GA 'DI BU STON GYI YIG CHA LA GZHI BYAS, RDO RJE 'PHRENG BA DANG SNGAGS RIN CHEN MO DANG MKHAS PA GZHAN GYI GSUM GYI LEGS CHAS KYANG KHA BKANG NAS, MDO SMAD PA W'A GINDRA MA TI SA MU DU SHR'I BHA DRAS SBYAR BA 'DIS KYANG PHAN BDE'I 'BYUNG GNAS RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA SPYI DANG KHYAD PAR KHAMS GSUM CHOS KYI RGYAL PO BTZONG KHA PA CHEN PO'I LUNG RTOGS KYI BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE PHYOGS DUS KUN TU RGYAS SHING 'GRO BA YONGS LA BDE LEGS KYI DPAL RTAG TU 'BYUNG BAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
